description: The Department of National Defence seeks to procure 10 windshields with the following specifications: Part No.: 370-403-00, NCAGE: F0360. Delivery is requested at the depot(s) identified below.
full_summary:
# Windshield L/H 
### ID: cb-4908-82467578 

#### Introduction

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking to purchase windshields for aircraft. The procurement follows the competitive bidding process.

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: cb-4908-82467578
* **Tender Title**: Windshield L/H 
* **Publication Date**: April 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 4, 2023, at 14:00 hours
* **Trade Agreements**: [Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)] 
* **Delivery Location**: 25 CFSD Montreal
* **Item Details**: 
	+ NIBS: 1560
	+ NNO: 1560-14-470-3567
	+ Part No.: 370-403-00
	+ NCAGE: F0360
	+ Quantity: 10
	+ Unit of Issue: Each

#### Instructions and Requirements

* Bidders must submit a sealed bid in accordance with the procurement documents.
* Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must include the Part Number and NCAGE of the proposed product.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada, English or French.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

#### Inquiry and Response Point of Contact

* **Name**: Ryan Duncan, Contracting Officer
* **Email**: Ryan.Duncan@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (819) 664-0654

#### Procurement Documents

* [procurement document URL](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4908/w8485-237545-c-rfp-eng.pdf) (English)
* [procurement document URL](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4908/w8485-237545-c-rfp-fr.pdf) (French)
